message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive price of $100. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. I believe you'll find its quality and features well worth the investment.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80 for the product. I'm really interested in it, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. Let me make you a special deal: the product can be yours for $90. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.

I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $80. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $85? I'm really interested in the product, and I think it's worth the investment, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
